alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Houghton; Iron; Keweenaw; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 2:38PM EST until November 30 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Northern Houghton, Baraga, Iron and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall will be over the higher terrain with significantly less in the lower elevations including the L`anse area. Additional headlines may be needed on Wednesday as lake effect snow develops over the western areas. Additionally, winds gusting to 45 mph are expected over the Keweenaw on Wednesday which could result in low visibilities in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Houghton; Iron; Keweenaw; Southern Houghton
